This is NOT a complete collection of seagrasses on the seafloor, nor are the locations to be considered exact. The presence and location of the seagrasses have been derived from multiple state websites. These data are intended for coastal and ocean planning. Not for navigation.]]></Abstract>     <KeywordList><Keyword><![CDATA[Oceans, Marine, National, Renewable energy, offshore, NOAA OCM, BOEM]]></Keyword></KeywordList>     <OnlineResource
